text.div:
ConsentExceptType

How an exception is statement is applied, as adding additional consent, or removing consent

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/consent-except-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
deny Opt OutConsent is denied for actions meeting these rules
permit Opt InConsent is provided for actions meeting these rules

name: ConsentExceptType
description: How an exception is statement is applied, as adding additional consent, or removing consent

concept.definition: Consent is denied for actions meeting these rules
Consent is provided for actions meeting these rules
